title: DIY Electrolyte Sports Drink
directions: Cut ginger into large coins and place into a large pot. Add water.
Bring water to a boil and then simmer for 15 minutes. Shut off heat and let the ginger water steep until cool.
Add liquid stevia to taste and store in airtight container, pitcher, or jar in the fridge.
1. Mix all ingredients together into a large jar or pitcher and stir to combine. Refrigerate and now you have a healthy, natural sports drink!
ingredients: 1/2 liter of ginger water, recipe below
1/2 tsp. sea salt (you can add a bit more if youâ€™d like)
